name: Gateway Wall: Signed by Bemo
description:
At TON Gateway, we kicked off a spontaneous and fun activity: a sticker wall that turned into a vibrant canvas of signatures, shoutouts, and community vibes. It wasn’t just a wall—it became a moment, a memory, a snapshot of real people building the TON ecosystem together.

To preserve that moment and share it with the world, we’ve transformed the wall into a unique NFT collection. 'Gateway Wall: Signed by Bemo' captures the energy, creativity, and spirit of the conference—now forever on-chain.
